T02D1243:162a-1: he badzra n'a ma s'a dha nam /

T02D1243:162b-0: spros pas khams gsum @162b gsal bar byas nas slar

T02D1243:162b-20: yang rang gi sa bon las 'od zer spros te /

T02D1243:162b-31: med ma dang gnyis su med pa'i bde ba nyams

T02D1243:163a-15: pa'i stong pa nyid yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1243:163a-16: sems bde ba chen po bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1243:163a-17: bdag gis 'di ltar bla na med pa byang chub

T02D1243:163a-19: // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /

T02D1243:163a-23: kyi byams pa chen po dang /

T02D1243:163a-27: med pa mthong nas de bsgral ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i
T02D1243:163a-29: bde ba chen po dang ma bral bar mthong ba'i dga' ba dang /

T02D1243:163a-31: de ltar bla na med pa'i chos thams cad rab

T02D1243:163a-34: gyis gzod ma nas skye ba med par gsal bar

T02D1243:163a-39: sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'a

T02D1243:163b-9: me dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer shin tu 'bar ba'i
T02D1243:163b-10: tshogs ji tsam 'dod par spro ste /

T02D1243:165b-8: dngos grub can la sogs pa lha mang po dang /
T02D1243:165b-9: dam tshig gi bdag nyid rnal 'byor ma rnams 'du ba'i tshogs gnod sbyin dang /
T02D1243:165b-11: yi dags srog gcod pa la sogs pa rgyu bar gnas pa'o //
T02D1243:165b-12: bdag la dga' ba cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa /
T02D1243:165b-13: sgra chen po sgrogs pa'i dur khrod chen po'o //
T02D1243:165b-14: de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i
T02D1243:165b-15: steng du 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi gan rkyal du 'jug
T02D1243:165b-16: par blta'o // phung po'i bdud tshangs pa dang /
T02D1243:165b-17: nyon mongs pa'i bdud khyab 'jug dang /
T02D1243:165b-18: lha'i bu'i bdud brgya byin dang /
T02D1243:165b-19: 'chi bdag gi bdud dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02D1243:165b-20: bdud bzhi'i snying gar nyi mas mnan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1243:165b-21: shar la sogs pa bzhir tshangs pa la sogs pa mnan pa'o //
T02D1243:165b-22: dbang ldan la sogs pa bzhir gshin rje dang /
T02D1243:165b-26: de brgyad kyi snying gar zla bas mnan pa'o //
T02D1243:165b-27: de dag thams cad gzhal yas khang grub pa'i rjes su bsam mo //
T02D1243:165b-28: der a'a li bcu drug nyis 'gyur du byas pa
T02D1243:165b-29: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shes rab kyi gzugs kyi
T02D1243:165b-30: rang bzhin me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D1243:165b-31: de'i steng du k'a li sum cu rtsa bzhi dha
T02D1243:165b-32: da dha da ya la de ltar drug gi bzhi
T02D1243:165b-33: bcu'o // de dag nyis 'gyur du byas pa las
T02D1243:165b-34: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thabs kyi rang bzhin ni mnyam
T02D1243:165b-35: pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1243:165b-36: de gnyis kha sbyor ba'i dbus su h'um dang aam gnyis 'od du zhu ba las /
T02D1243:165b-37: gri gug dang thod pa sbyar ba la rang gi
T02D1243:165b-38: sa bon gyis mtshan pa ni so sor rtog pa'i
T02D1243:165b-39: ye shes so // sa bon gnyis las 'od zer
T02D1243:165b-40: 'phros pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsal bar
T02D1243:165b-41: byas nas de rnams kyi 'od zer gyis bkug nas
T02D1243:165b-43: thams cad gcig tu gyur pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
T02D1243:165b-44: de'i thog tu zla ba dang /
T02D1243:166a-0: phyag mtshan rnams yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das @166a * //
T02D1243:166a-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mdog dan phyag mtshan 'og nas 'byung ba lta bu'i /
T02D1243:166a-2: dpal kye rdo rje'i gzugs su langs te /
T02D1243:166a-3: rgyu'i rdo rje 'dzin gyi rang bzhin bdag med mas ltag nas 'khyud pa /
T02D1243:166a-4: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02D1243:166a-5: ye shes lnga'i byang chub pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1243:166a-6: de nas aom padma su kha dh'a ra ma h'a
T02D1243:166a-7: r'a ga su kha% dad ta tsa tu r'a nanda
T02D1243:166a-9: h'u% h'u% h'u% karyam ku ru shva me /
T02D1243:166a-10: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tu r'a nanda
T02D1243:166a-11: da ya ka kha ga mu khe ka ra so
T02D1243:166a-12: n'a tha h'u% h'u% h'u% karyam ku ru shva me
T02D1243:166a-13: zhes padma dang rdo rje byin gyis brlab bar bya'o
T02D1243:166a-14: // aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1243:166a-15: de ma thag tu rjes su chags par bya'o //
T02D1243:166a-16: sbyor ba dang po bshad pa'o //
T02D1243:166a-17: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya'i rim pa'o //
T02D1243:166a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar h'um bcom
T02D1243:166a-19: ldan 'das ma'i thugs kar aom gi sa bon bltas
T02D1243:166a-20: nas snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas
T02D1243:166a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug nas snying ga'i
T02D1243:166a-23: de rnams 'od du zhu ba las shar phyogs la
T02D1243:166a-24: sogs par tshangs pa'i gdan gnas pa'i steng du zla
T02D1243:166a-25: ba dang / nyi ma kha sbyar la byang chub
T02D1243:166a-26: kyi sems kyi thig le zhu nas phyir 'phros pa
T02D1243:166a-27: dang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gam tsa%
T02D1243:166a-28: ba% gha% pa% sha% la% da% zhes bya ba'i sa
T02D1243:166a-30: de rnams yongs su gyur pa las gri gug dang /
T02D1243:166a-38: de'i steng du yang sa bon gyi yi ge rnams so //
T02D1243:166a-41: phyag mtshan la sogs pa zhu nas sngon po dang
T02D1243:166a-42: 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' lnga'i mngon par byang
T02D1243:166a-43: chub pa las goo r'i la sogs pa bsgom par
T02D1243:166a-44: bya ste / de la shar sgor ga% gi yi
T02D1243:166a-45: ge las skyes pa'i goo r'i dkar mo mdog nag
T02D1243:166a-46: bya ste / mo // phyag g-yas na gri gug / g-yon na nya ro hi ta /
T02D1243:166a-48: gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin dgod do //
T02D1243:166a-49: lho'i sgo la tsa% gi yi ge las skyes pa tsoo r'i dmar mo phyag g-yas na cang te'u /
T02D1243:166a-51: dbang po mnan pa tshor ba'i phung po'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D1243:166a-52: nub kyi sgor bam gyi rnam pa las skyes pa
T02D1243:166b-0: be t'a l'i gser bcom lta bu phyag @166b g-yas
T02D1243:166b-1: na rus sbal / g-yon padma'i snod nye dbang mnan pa 'du shes kyi phung po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1243:166b-2: byang gi sgor ghasma r'i gha% gi rnam pa las skyes pa ljang gu phyag g-yas na sbrul /
T02D1243:166b-4: drag po mnan pa 'du byed kyi phung po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1243:166b-5: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su pukka s'i sngon mo pa%
T02D1243:166b-6: gi rnam pa las skyes pa phyag g-yas na seng
T02D1243:166b-8: gshin rje mnan pa khams kyi rang bzhin bsam mo //
T02D1243:166b-9: me'i mtshams su sha ba r'i sha% gi rnam pa
T02D1243:166b-10: las skyes pa kha dog dkar po phyag g-yas na
T02D1243:166b-11: dge slong / g-yon na gsil byed /
T02D1243:166b-12: gshin rje mnan pa chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin bsam mo //
T02D1243:166b-13: bden bral du gtum mo la% yig gi rnam pa
T02D1243:166b-14: las skyes pa sngon mo phyag g-yas na 'khor lo
T02D1243:166b-16: srin po mnan pa me'i khams kyi rang bzhin bsgom mo //
T02D1243:166b-17: rlung gi mtshams su dom bi n'i da% gi rnam
T02D1243:166b-18: pa las skyes pa kha dog sna tshogs pa phyag
T02D1243:166b-20: g-yon na sdigs mdzug thags bzangs ris mnan pa rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin bsgom mo //
T02D1243:166b-21: de rnams thams cad spyan zlum zhing dmar po gsum pa skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa /
T02D1243:166b-22: skra ser po gyen du brjes pa /
T02D1243:166b-24: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa //
T02D1243:166b-25: zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D1243:166b-26: gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa /
T02D1243:166b-29: byang chub kyi sems 'phro ba las byung ba yang dag par bsgom mo //
T02D1243:166b-30: de nas aom a'a: h'u% gi yi ge gsum gyi
T02D1243:166b-31: rang bzhin ho:dmar po gnyis kyis mtshan pa mtha' ma
T02D1243:166b-32: brten pa dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra ba mthong
T02D1243:166b-33: ba las rjes su chags pas bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1243:166b-35: rdo rje'i lam nas lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
T02D1243:166b-36: de lta bu'i rang bzhin bsgom mo //
T02D1243:166b-37: de'i rjes su bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba
T02D1243:166b-38: chen por ro gcig pas rang gi rig ma dang
T02D1243:166b-39: lhan cig zhu bar gyur pa las rang gi sa
T02D1243:166b-40: bon gyi gzugs kyis rnam par gnas par bsam mo
T02D1243:166b-41: // de nas pukka s'i la sogs pa'i lha mo
T02D1243:166b-42: bzhi po rnams rang rang gi mgon med par shes
T02D1243:166b-43: nas yid sdug bsngal chen por gyur te /
T02D1243:167a-0: shin tu 'dod pa'i sems dang rab tu sad par 'dod pa rnams @167a * //
T02D1243:167a-1: kyis rdo rje'i glus bskul bas bcom ldan 'das bzhengs su gsol ba /
T02D1243:167a-2: rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhings shig / pukka s'i ni bdag la skyobs //
T02D1243:167a-3: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1243:167a-4: bdag la bde chen sbyor bar mdzod //
T02D1243:167a-5: khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1243:167a-6: kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig //
T02D1243:167a-7: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spangs la //
T02D1243:167a-8: sa ba ri 'bras grub par mdzod //
T02D1243:167a-9: dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba //
T02D1243:167a-10: stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci //
T02D1243:167a-11: khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas //
T02D1243:167a-12: gtum mo bdag ni zhu ba bgyid //
T02D1243:167a-13: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1243:167a-14: mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig //
T02D1243:167a-15: dom bi bdag ni dran nyams pas //
T02D1243:167a-16: snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig //
T02D1243:167a-17: ces de kho na nyid kyi glu rnams kyis bskul
T02D1243:167a-18: bas rmi lam rab tu sad pa ltar bcom ldan
T02D1243:167a-19: 'das tu bzhengs nas bdud rtsir zhu bar gyur pa
T02D1243:167a-21: / de'i steng du sa bon gnyis gyur pa'i phyag mtshan de yang h'u% dang aam gis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1243:167a-22: de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gcig tu gyur nas /
T02D1243:167a-23: aam gi rnam pa las byung ba bdag med ma
T02D1243:167a-24: la snyoms par zhugs pas h'u% las skyes pa'i bcom
T02D1243:167a-25: ldan 'das kyis bdag nyid 'bras bu kye rdo rje
T02D1243:167a-26: zhabs brkyang bskums du bzhugs pa /
T02D1243:167a-27: lha dang lha ma yin la sdigs pas khros pa /
T02D1243:167a-28: thod pa lngas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D1243:167a-29: gzhon nu lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra ba /
T02D1243:167a-30: zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi mnan pa /
T02D1243:167a-31: mgo bo rlon pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba can /
T02D1243:167a-32: spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje nag pos mnan pa /
T02D1243:167a-33: nyi ma'i 'od lta bur 'bar ba zhal nas h'u% gi sgra sgrogs pa /
T02D1243:167a-34: lus la thal bas byugs pa /
T02D1243:167a-35: zhal brgyad pa rtsa ba'i zhal nag po chen po //
T02D1243:167a-37: yang g-yas pa gnyis ni nag po'o //
T02D1243:167a-39: yang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni nag po'o //
T02D1243:167a-40: steng gi zhal ni bung ba'i mdog go //
T02D1243:167a-42: so so'i zhal spyan dmar po gsum gsum mnga' ba /
T02D1243:167a-43: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa /
T02D1243:167b-2: gar gyi ro dgu'i tshul du bzhugs pa /
T02D1243:167b-3: skra seng po gyen du 'khyil ba /
T02D1243:167b-4: phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa /
T02D1243:167b-5: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /
T02D1243:167b-7: g-yas kyi phyag brgyad du glang po che dang /
T02D1243:167b-15: thod pa'i snod brgyad du glang po che la sogs pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no /
T02D1243:167b-23: gnod sbyin te de lta bu'i rnam pa bsam mo //
T02D1243:167b-24: bdag med ma la sogs pa ni zhabs gnyis phyag gnyis ma /
T02D1243:167b-25: zhal gcig ma nag mo spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa /
T02D1243:167b-28: skra ser po gyen du 'khyil pa /
T02D1243:167b-29: thod pa lngas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D1243:167b-30: mgo bo skam po lnga bcu'i do shal can /
T02D1243:167b-31: phyag g-yas na gri gug / g-yon na thod pa //
T02D1243:167b-32: bcom ldan 'das la phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa /
T02D1243:167b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyi ma mchu'i ro myang ba bsam par bya'o //
T02D1243:167b-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar padma /
T02D1243:167b-36: de'i steng du h'u% sngon po'o //
T02D1243:167b-37: bdag med ma'i thugs kar padma'i steng na zla ba /
T02D1243:167b-38: de'i dkyil nas aa las byung ba'i gri gug yu ba la zla ba //
T02D1243:167b-39: de'i steng du aam bsam par bya'o //
T02D1243:167b-40: rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyi thugs kar yang padma /
T02D1243:167b-41: de'i steng du zla ba de'i steng du rang gi sa bon //
T02D1243:167b-42: de gyur pa las phyag mtshan /
T02D1243:167b-43: de la yang zla ba'i steng du sa bon bsam par bya'o //
T02D1243:167b-44: de dag ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1243:167b-45: de nas dkyil 'khor yongs su bsgrubs la /
T02D1243:167b-46: sa bon de rnams las phyir 'phros te /
T02D1243:167b-47: nam mkha' khyab par spros nas /
T02D1243:167b-48: de dag gsal bar byas nas rang gi snying ga'i
T02D1243:167b-49: sa bon las 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus ye
T02D1243:167b-51: shar phyogs kyi nam mkhar bzhugs nas zhal brgyad kyi h'um gis bgegs bskrad de /
T02D1243:167b-52: mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas yang mchod cing bstod nas /
T02D1243:167b-53: dza:h'u% bam ho:bskur bas goo r'i la sogs pa rim pa ji lta bas dgug pa dang /
T02D1243:168a-2: dgyes par byas nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang //
T02D1243:168a-3: ye shes kyi 'khor lo gnyis chu la chu bzhag pa bzhin gcig tu gyur par bsam mo //
T02D1243:168a-4: mig la gti mug rdo rje ma //
T02D1243:168a-5: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1243:168a-6: sna la ser sna rdo rje la //
T02D1243:168a-7: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma//
T02D1243:168a-8: lus la phra dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1243:168a-9: yid la bdag med rnam 'byor ma //
T02D1243:168a-10: dkar mo rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1243:168a-11: nag mo bdag med ma dang /
T02D1243:168a-12: ser mo nang gi goo r'i dang //
T02D1243:168a-13: dmar mo rdo rje chu ma dang //
T02D1243:168a-14: ljang gu rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1243:168a-15: yang nag mo ni bdag med ma'o //
T02D1243:168a-16: de rnams rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i ming bzhi'o //
T02D1243:168a-17: gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rang rang
T02D1243:168a-18: gi sa bon rnams las byung ba go chas dbang
T02D1243:168a-19: po dag pa'o // de nas lus ngag yid gsum
T02D1243:168a-20: pa yi ge aom a'a:h'u% las sa spyod ma dang
T02D1243:168a-21: po dag pa'o // / mkha' spyod ma dang //
T02D1243:168a-22: bdag med ma rigs gsum pas byung ba'o //
T02D1243:168a-23: de dag kyang phyag gnyis pa gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1243:168a-25: ro'i steng na zla ba mnan pa bsam pa bya'o //
T02D1243:168a-26: rang rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer
T02D1243:168a-27: 'phros pas sangs rgyas spyan drangs te nam mkha' la
T02D1243:168a-28: bzhugs pa la lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis yang
T02D1243:168a-29: dag par mchod de gsol la ba gdab po ;
T02D1243:168a-30: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D1243:168a-31: de nas sangs rgyas de rnams kyis he ru ka'i
T02D1243:168a-32: gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyis
T02D1243:168a-33: bdud rtsi lngas bum pa gang bas /
T02D1243:168a-35: snang ba thams cad skyes tsam na //
T02D1243:168a-36: de bzhin chu yis khrus byas ltar //
T02D1243:168a-37: de bzhin gshegs pas dbang mdzad de //
T02D1243:168a-38: dag pa bzang po'i chus dbang bskur //
T02D1243:168a-39: zhes brjod de dbang bskur ro //
T02D1243:168a-40: dbang bskur ba'i rjes la me tog dang gur kum gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1243:168a-42: dbang bskur bas spyi bor rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos mtshan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1243:168a-43: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D1243:168a-44: de ltar mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1243:168a-47: snang ba mtha' yas rnams kyis goo r'i la sogs
T02D1243:168a-48: pa bzhi la dbu brgyan pa ni zhe sdang dang
T02D1243:168b-3: pukka s'i la sogs pa'i phyag rgya de nyid do /
T02D1243:168b-4: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D1243:168b-5: badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i
T02D1243:168b-6: sngags bzlas so // de nas yam nag po las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D1243:168b-7: de'i steng du ram dmar po las ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po //
T02D1243:168b-8: de'i steng du thod pa gsum //
T02D1243:168b-9: de'i steng du aa dmar po las byung ba'i thod pa phyi dkar la nang dmar ba /
T02D1243:168b-10: de'i nang aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1243:168b-11: de'i steng du bh'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um rigs lnga'i
T02D1243:168b-12: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin bdud rtsi lnga dang sha
T02D1243:168b-13: lnga kun go gu da ha na de'i steng du
T02D1243:168b-14: aom yig las kha chod kyi ngo bo dang /
T02D1243:168b-15: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1243:168b-16: de'i steng du h'u% las rdo rje rtse lnga pa lte bar h'u% gis mtshan par bsam /
T02D1243:168b-17: h'u% las spros pa'i 'od zer gyis rlung gi ba
T02D1243:168b-18: dan bskyod pas zla ba'i rdo rje'i lhag ma zhu
T02D1243:168b-19: bar gyur te / thod pa na gnas pa'i rdo
T02D1243:168b-20: rje yang lan lngar 'bar ba'i bdud rtsi kun dkrugs
T02D1243:168b-21: pas 'bar nas de nyid du zhu bar gyur nas
T02D1243:168b-22: bar gyur te / der lhung ste / aom a'a:h'u%
T02D1243:168b-23: gi yi ge de gsum gyis khams gsum gyi bdud
T02D1243:168b-24: rtsi drangs nas thim pas yi ge gsum gyis byin
T02D1243:168b-25: gyis brlabs pas gcig tu gyur to //
T02D1243:168b-26: 'khor lo'i lha dang lha mo de dag gi lce
T02D1243:168b-27: la h'u% las byung ba'i rdo rje nas tsam sbu
T02D1243:168b-29: de'i rdo rje bcud len te /
T02D1243:168b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pas gsol bar bsam mo //
T02D1243:168b-31: de nas zhal du ji ltar rigs par bdag med ma la sogs pa la ster ba ste /
T02D1243:168b-32: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta badzra
T02D1243:168b-33: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham sngags de bzlas pas
T02D1243:168b-34: 'khor lo'i lha thams cad mnyes par gyur te /
T02D1243:168b-35: rang gi snying ga'i bon las 'od 'phros pas gzugs rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1243:168b-38: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma ste /
T02D1243:168b-43: reg bya rdo rje ma na bza' sna tshogs 'dzin ma /
T02D1243:168b-44: chos kyi 'byung gnas phyag gis 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1243:168b-45: de dag la sogs pa ni sna tshogs pa yo byad kyi dkyil 'khor dang rang la mchod pa'o //
T02D1243:168b-46: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1243:168b-47: de bzlas nas sangs rgyas spyan dang /
T02D1243:169a-0: sgrol ma bzhis 'khor lo la bstod @169a * //
T02D1243:169a-2: / khyod ni rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyis bskor //
T02D1243:169a-3: nyid kyi thugs kyis byin brlabs khyod dgongs grub //
T02D1243:169a-4: 'gro ba g-yo dang mi g-yo khyod kyis dbang //
T02D1243:169a-5: thugs kyi thugs kyis sems can sgrol bar mdzad //
T02D1243:169a-6: bsam mi khyab la mi ldog brtson par byed //
T02D1243:169a-7: thugs dgyes mdzod cig dpal ldan kye rdo rje //
T02D1243:169a-8: de ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rdo rje'i glus bstod do //
T02D1243:169a-9: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta stu ti ra badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bzlas so //
T02D1243:169a-10: pho brang dag pa ni rnam par snang mdzad de yan lag dang po'o //
T02D1243:169a-11: rjes su chags pa dag pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste gnyis pa'o //
T02D1243:169a-12: dbang gi dag pa ni mi bskyod pa ste gsum pa'o //
T02D1243:169a-13: bdud rtsi myang ba'i rang bzhin dag pa ni 'od dpag med pa ste bzhi pa'o //
T02D1243:169a-14: mchod pa dag pa ni don yod grub pa ste lnga pa'o //
T02D1243:169a-15: bstod pa dag pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan te drug pa'o //
T02D1243:169a-16: de ltar 'khor lo yan lag drug bsgoms pa des ni myur du dngos grub thab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1243:169a-17: de ltar bsgoms pas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ni
T02D1243:169a-18: dang po sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i nya'i zla ba dang
T02D1243:169a-20: de bas kyang cher goms pa la ni sgyu ma dang 'dra bar snang ngo //
T02D1243:169a-21: de bas kyang cher goms pa las ni rmi lam dang 'dra bar snang ngo //
T02D1243:169a-22: shin tu goms pas rnam par smin pas gnyid ma log pa dang 'dra bar snang ngo //
T02D1243:169a-23: de nas dkar mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma brgyad dang //
T02D1243:169a-24: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo phyogs bcur rgyun mi 'chad par spros te //
T02D1243:169a-25: sna tshogs pa'i gdul bya sems can la sogs pa'i
T02D1243:169a-26: gzugs su sprul nas sems can gyi don byas te
T02D1243:169a-27: so so ji ltar 'dul ba'i don byas nas de'i
T02D1243:169a-28: rjes la slar 'dus nas dkyil 'khor bde ba chen
T02D1243:169a-29: por blta'o // de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya'i rim pa'o //
T02D1243:169a-30: de ltar khams gsum thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam mo //
T02D1243:169a-31: 'di ltar thabs dang shes rab ro gcig pa bde
T02D1243:169a-32: ba chen po las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D1243:169a-33: las 'phros pa de lta bur shes nas goo r'i
T02D1243:169a-34: la sogs pa lha mo brgyad rang gi zhal du
T02D1243:169a-35: thim / de'i rjes su zhal bdun rtsa ba'i zhal la thim //
T02D1243:169b-0: de bzhin du phyag bcu @169b bzhi phyag mtshan dang bsam pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis la thim /
T02D1243:169b-1: de bzhin du zhabs gnyis rtsa ba'i zhabs la thim par bsam mo //
T02D1243:169b-2: de ltar thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyi
T02D1243:169b-3: gzugs khams gsum thams cad gcig tu gyur par mthong
T02D1243:169b-4: ste / ji ltar gnas bzhi 'khor lo bzhir rgyas btab bo //
T02D1243:169b-5: de ltar lte ba'i 'og tu sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas te //
T02D1243:169b-6: kha dog sna tshogs pa padma'i 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la /
T02D1243:169b-7: de'i lte bar sa bon aom nag po 'od ser po can kha yar blta ba'o //
T02D1243:169b-8: snying gar chos kyi 'khor lo dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa ste //
T02D1243:169b-9: de'i dbus su h'u% gi rnam pa sngon po kha
T02D1243:169b-10: thur du bltas pa de'i padma 'dab ma brgyad la
T02D1243:169b-11: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham phyogs bzhir dgod do //
T02D1243:169b-12: mgrin par longs spyod kyi 'khor lo dmar po padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa ste //
T02D1243:169b-13: de'i dbus su aom gyi rnam pa dmar po kha
T02D1243:169b-14: gyen du bltas pa aom la% aa la% bzhis bskor
T02D1243:169b-15: ba'o // spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo
T02D1243:169b-16: ni padma dkar po 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1243:169b-18: de'i dbus su ha% gi rnam pa dkar po bdud rtsi 'bab pa shin du gsal bar bltas la //
T02D1243:169b-19: 'khor lo yang dag par bsgoms nas /
T02D1243:169b-20: 'od zer gyi tshogs nam mkha' khyab par spros pa dang //
T02D1243:169b-21: bsdu ba yang de nyid kyi nang du thim par bya'o //
T02D1243:169b-22: de lta bu'i dus la rnal 'byor gyis sngags bzlas
T02D1243:169b-23: pa 'di'i tshul gyis nges par sngags kyi yi ge
T02D1243:169b-24: bzlas te // lha mo'i zhal nas 'od zer dang ldan pa 'phros pas gtso bo'i zhal du zhugs //
T02D1243:169b-25: rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas padmar zhugs /
T02D1243:169b-26: yang lha mo'i zhal nas gtso bo'i zhal du zhugs /
T02D1243:169b-27: de'i rim pas rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas so /
T02D1243:169b-28: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dbye bas dkar po'i las bya'o //
T02D1243:169b-30: aom aa sht'a na n'a ya pim go rdha ke sha wa rtma ni /
T02D1243:169b-31: tsa tu ra bim sha ti ne tr'a ya //
T02D1243:169b-32: sho da sha bhu dz'a ya /
T02D1243:169b-33: krishna dz'i m'a ta wa pu she /
T02D1243:169b-34: ka p'a la m'a l'a ne k'i dh'a ri ne
T02D1243:169b-35: aa dhm'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya aardhendu damsht'i ne
T02D1243:169b-36: / aom m'a ra ya m'a ra ya //
T02D1243:169b-37: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya //
T02D1243:169b-40: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02D1243:169b-41: sapta s'a ga r'a na bandha bandha /
T02D1243:170a-0: @170a * // ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha:phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1243:170a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so //
T02D1243:170a-2: aom de wa bi tsu ba dzra h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1243:170a-4: aom ba dzra kart'a ri he badzr'a ya h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1243:170a-5: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so //
T02D1243:170a-6: de nas zla ba dang ldan pa aam gi sa bon dang bcas par bdag med ma zhu /
T02D1243:170a-7: bcom ldan 'das ma bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon thim par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1243:170a-8: de nas sprul pa'i sa bon las mar me 'bar
T02D1243:170a-9: ba dang 'dra ba'i gtum mo sbar bas gtum pa'i
T02D1243:170a-10: phyir na gtum mo'i gzugs te //
T02D1243:170a-11: des chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02D1243:170a-12: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas //
T02D1243:170a-13: a'a li k'a li ldan pa'i longs spyod kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1243:170a-14: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo de'i dbus na gnas pa'i ye shes kyi gzugs kyi ham bsregs te /
T02D1243:170a-15: bsregs nas mi shigs pa'i bde ba chen po'i gzugs
T02D1243:170a-16: byang chub kyi sems bzung nas bcom ldan 'das de
T02D1243:170a-17: dang lhan cig tu ro gcig par gyur nas yang
T02D1243:170a-18: slar log ste nyi ma dang thod pa bzung nas
T02D1243:170a-19: snying ga'i sa bon la thim par bsam mo //
T02D1243:170a-20: de nas sa bon nyid gcig pu ste //
T02D1243:170a-21: rigs lnga'i bdag nyid du 'od gsal ba tsam du gnas pa'o //
T02D1243:170a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' thig le ste //
T02D1243:170a-24: mi bskyod pa yang de nyid yin //
T02D1243:170a-25: zla tshes rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1243:170a-26: rang gi rin chen 'byung ldan te //
T02D1243:170a-27: ha ni snang ba mtha' yas yin //
T02D1243:170a-28: au ni don yod grub pa ste //
T02D1243:170a-29: sangs rgyas lnga ru de shes nas //
T02D1243:170a-31: de n'a da las dmar mo lta bu'i 'od 'phros
T02D1243:170a-32: te au phrag dog gi rang bzhin gyi gzugs lha
T02D1243:170a-33: la thim ste / de nas ha 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ser sna'i gzugs zla tshes la thim /
T02D1243:170a-34: de nas gti mug gi gzugs thig le la thim /
T02D1243:170a-35: thig le'i phyed zhe sdang gi gzugs thig le la thim /
T02D1243:170a-36: thig le de chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs tsam la thim mo //
T02D1243:170a-37: de ltar chos thams cad gnyis su med pa rtag pa dang //
T02D1243:170a-38: chad pa dbus med par kun la mi gnas pa'i
T02D1243:170a-39: bde ba chen po ste n'a da tsam gnas so
T02D1243:170b-0: // de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i @170b mtshan nyid bshad zin to //
T02D1243:170b-2: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02D1243:170b-3: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D1243:170b-4: don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
T02D1243:170b-6: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'a a'a dya nutpanna tv'ata /
T02D1243:170b-8: sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'bum phrag lnga'i rgyud las kyang gsungs pa //
T02D1243:170b-9: chos rnams skye med yi ge gnas med pa //
T02D1243:170b-10: tshig tu brjod med yid kyi yul med las //
T02D1243:170b-11: 'di ltar skyes pa'i chos rnams rab tu gsungs //
T02D1243:170b-12: de ltar chos ni skye ba med pa'o //
T02D1243:170b-14: de nas sngon gyi sngon lam gyi stobs kyis sna
T02D1243:170b-15: tshogs pa'i sems can gyi sems ji ltar 'dul ba'i
T02D1243:170b-16: dbang gi chos kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa
T02D1243:170b-18: sems can ma lus pa'i don byed do //
T02D1243:170b-20: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang de las //
T02D1243:170b-21: ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po //
T02D1243:170b-22: de yi dbang gis 'di yin te //
T02D1243:170b-23: dkyil 'khor de na gzhan ma yin //
T02D1243:170b-24: ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam bzhin //
T02D1243:170b-25: ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer bzhin //
T02D1243:170b-26: de ltar dkyil 'khor sa le bar //
T02D1243:170b-27: goms par gyur nas de ltar mthong //
T02D1243:170b-29: de ltar khams gsum thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1243:170b-30: bdag nyid de chu zla ba dang 'dra bar rten
T02D1243:170b-31: 'brel las skyes par shes nas dbang po'i sgo mi
T02D1243:170b-32: 'gog cing gang la yang mi brten pa the tshom
T02D1243:170b-33: dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor pas lha'i nga rgyal ji
T02D1243:170b-34: lta bar bde bar spyod par byed do //
T02D1243:170b-35: 'di lta ste klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas de gsungs pa //
T02D1243:170b-36: 'di ni khams gsum min te gzhal yas khang pa yin //
T02D1243:170b-37: srog chags min te rgyal ba'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo yin //
T02D1243:170b-38: yul min dbang po min te 'byung ba la sogs min //
T02D1243:170b-39: gzugs la sogs pa ma yin chos nyid bdag nyid do //
T02D1243:170b-41: sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'khor lo shes te ci ste 'khrul par byas pa yin //
T02D1243:170b-42: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i bshad pa'o //
T02D1243:170b-43: de'i phyir dag pa'i dran pa thams cad ni bar
T02D1243:170b-44: chad thams cad spong ba'i rnam par dag pa ni
T02D1243:170b-45: rdo rje'i rva ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1243:170b-46: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rnam par dag pas chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
T02D1243:170b-47: chos la gos pa med pa rnam par dag pas sna tshogs padma'o //
T02D1243:171a-1: cad rang bzhin med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D1243:171a-2: shes lnga rnam par dag pa ni sna tshogs rdo
T02D1243:171a-3: rje'o // rnam par snang mdzad btsun po dang ldan pa rnam par dag pas gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D1243:171a-4: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad rnam par dag pas chos sna tshogs dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1243:171a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin nyid la rang bzhin med par gnas pas zur bzhi mnyam pa'o /
T02D1243:171a-6: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni shar phyogs kyi sgo'o //
T02D1243:171a-7: yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par dag pa ni lho phyogs kyi sgo'o //
T02D1243:171a-8: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni nub kyi sgo'o //
T02D1243:171a-9: dbang po lnga rnam par dag pa ni byang gi sgo'o //
T02D1243:171a-10: bsam gtan bzhi rnam par dag pa ni rta babs bzhi'o //
T02D1243:171a-11: ting nge 'dzin bzhi rnam par dag pa ni snam bu bzhi'o //
T02D1243:171a-12: chos zab mo la bzod pa rnam par dag pa ni lha mo bcu drug go //
T02D1243:171a-13: gsung rab yan lag dgu rnam par dag pa ni dril bu dang 'phan la sogs pa'o //
T02D1243:171a-14: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa
T02D1243:171a-15: ni dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang nyi
T02D1243:171a-17: rnga yab dkar po bcu rnam par dag pa ni
T02D1243:171a-18: dge ba snying rjes 'dzin cing bsod nams dang ye
T02D1243:171a-20: phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog rnam par dag pa ni bum pa brgyad do //
T02D1243:171a-21: thams cad du ma bcings shing sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D1243:171a-22: chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rdo rje'i lam chos
T02D1243:171a-23: kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje'i
T02D1243:171a-25: gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa ni mtha'
T02D1243:171a-26: yas shing dpe med pa kun du 'dod pa'i yon
T02D1243:171a-27: tan lnga'o // chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni mchod pa rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1243:171a-28: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa rnam par dag pa ni sgo'i dar dbyangs so //
T02D1243:171a-29: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad rnam par dag pa ni ka ba brgyad do //
T02D1243:171a-30: chos thams cad sems med pa rnam rar dag pa ni dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1243:171a-31: 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag pa ni padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02D1243:171a-32: lte ba la rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i de
T02D1243:171a-33: kho na nyid drungs 'byin pa rnam par dag pa
T02D1243:171a-34: ni tshangs pa la sogs pa bzhi'i gdan no //
T02D1243:171a-35: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud 'khor zhing ma rig
T02D1243:171b-0: @171b pa'i mun pas mi dge ba'i 'dam du bying
T02D1243:171b-1: ba de bsal du phyir byang chub sems kyi myu
T02D1243:171b-2: gu bskyed pa rnam par dag pa ni tshangs pa
T02D1243:171b-3: la sogs pa'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro
T02D1243:171b-4: // 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad du bshad pa rnam
T02D1243:171b-5: par dag pa ni phyogs brgyad na bzhugs pa'i lha'i
T02D1243:171b-6: // gdan no // sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i
T02D1243:171b-7: me zhi ba rnam par dag pa ni zla ba'i
T02D1243:171b-8: // gdan no // gtan no // gzugs kyi phung po dang /
T02D1243:171b-10: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D1243:171b-12: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1243:171b-14: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa ni ro hi ta'o //
T02D1243:171b-15: nyon mongs pa drug rnam par dag pa ni gri gug go //
T02D1243:171b-17: nga rgyal dang phra ma dang /
T02D1243:171b-18: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D1243:171b-21: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa ni tsoo r'i'o //
T02D1243:171b-22: yan lag dgu rnam par dag pa ni rje chung ngo //
T02D1243:171b-23: gti mug rnam par dag pa ni phag pa'o //
T02D1243:171b-26: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D1243:171b-30: dri ma rnam par dag pa ni be t'a l'i'o //
T02D1243:171b-31: phrag dog rnam par dag pa ni rus sbal lo //
T02D1243:171b-32: stong pa rnam par dag pa ni thod pa'o //
T02D1243:171b-35: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang /
T02D1243:171b-36: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1243:171b-38: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1243:171b-39: ro rnam par dag pa ni ghasma r'i'o zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ni sprul lo //
T02D1243:171b-40: 'dod chags sbyor ba rnam par dag pa ni ga bur ro //
T02D1243:171b-42: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1243:171b-44: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni pukka s'i'o //
T02D1243:171b-45: nga rgyal rnam par dag ni seng ge'o //
T02D1243:171b-46: lus ngag yid rnam par dag pa ni dgra sta'o //
T02D1243:171b-48: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02D1243:171b-50: smon lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni sa pa r'i'o //
T02D1243:171b-51: byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa ni dge slong ngo //
T02D1243:172a-1: dran pa rnam par dag pa ni gsil byed do //
T02D1243:172a-3: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang /
T02D1243:172a-5: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni tsanda l'a'o //
T02D1243:172a-6: nyon mongs pa'i tha pa rlog par byed pas na thong ba'o //
T02D1243:172a-7: mi shes pa gcod par byed pas 'khor lo'o //
T02D1243:172a-9: rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'dus ma byas pa dang /
T02D1243:172a-11: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni dom bi n'i'o //
T02D1243:172a-12: ye shes dag pa'i phyir na rdo rje'o //
T02D1243:172a-13: bdud tshogs gcig gi ngo bo dag pa ni sdigs mdzub bo //
T02D1243:172a-14: rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang /
T02D1243:172a-15: zhe sdang chen po dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings
T02D1243:172a-16: kyi ye shes kyi tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kun
T02D1243:172a-19: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1243:172a-20: gzugs rnam par dag pa ni dpal te ru ka'o //
T02D1243:172a-21: byams pa'i sems rnam par dag pa ni nag po'i lus so //
T02D1243:172a-22: snying rje rnam par dag pa ni mig dmar po'o //
T02D1243:172a-24: lus ngag yid rnam par dag pa ni dmar po'o //
T02D1243:172a-25: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa ni zhal brgyad pa'o //
T02D1243:172a-26: de la dbang rnam par dag pa ni g-yon padma dmar po'o //
T02D1243:172a-27: zhi ba dag pa ni g-yos dkar po'o //
T02D1243:172a-32: don yod grub pa rnam par dag pa ni 'khor lo dang /
T02D1243:172a-37: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par dag pa ni thal bas byugs pa'o //
T02D1243:172a-38: khro bo ni 'dul bar dka' ba'i gdul bya 'dul ba'o //
T02D1243:172a-39: nang du 'dzum pa ni skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa'o //
T02D1243:172a-40: rang bzhin med par rtogs pa ni spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D1243:172a-41: rigs lngar gtogs pa ni dpral bar thod pa lnga'o //
T02D1243:172a-42: stong pa bcu drug ni phyag go //
T02D1243:172a-43: thabs dang shes rab ni g-yon pa dang g-yas pa na lha la sogs pa'i thod pa'o //
T02D1243:172a-50: mchin pa'i nad dang mcher ba'i nad ni glang po la sogs pa'i dag pa'o//
T02D1243:172b-0: @172b sems can thams cad kyi klo la sogs pa'i nad bsal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1243:172b-1: dbang phyug thams cad grub par bya ba'i phyir rnam
T02D1243:172b-2: par dag pa ni sa la sogs pa brgyad do
T02D1243:172b-3: // a'a li k'a li rnam par dag pa ni brgya phyed kyi thod pa'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1243:172b-4: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnam par dag pa ni zhabs so ;
T02D1243:172b-5: / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa ni phags pa'o //
T02D1243:172b-6: bden pa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni rus pa'o //
T02D1243:172b-10: g-yung mo ni rkang dang tshil dag go //
T02D1243:172b-14: 'du byed ni dkar mo la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1243:172b-17: chos rnam par dag pa ni sku gsum mo //
T02D1243:172b-18: bde ba chen po'i sku rnam par dag pa ni khong du dran pa'o //
T02D1243:172b-19: khams gsum ma lus pa dmigs pa med pa'i dag par bya ba ni skyil krung phyed pa'o //
T02D1243:172b-20: sgo'i ngos thams cad rnam par dag pa ni rkang
T02D1243:172b-21: pa ya gcig gi mthe bong nyi ma la reg
T02D1243:172b-22: pa'o // chos thams cad med pa rnam par byang
T02D1243:172b-23: ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
T02D1243:172b-24: bzhin bdag med pa yod med kyi skyon dag par
T02D1243:172b-25: bya ba ni gri gug go //
T02D1243:172b-26: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag ni mgo bo'i padma'i snod do //
T02D1243:172b-27: bdud bzhi'i khrag dag par bas pa ni ka p'a la khrag gis bkang ba'o //
T02D1243:172b-28: rigs lnga dag pa ni thod pa'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1243:172b-29: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo ni lag pa'o //
T02D1243:172b-30: bden pa gnyis rnam par dag pa ni zhabs gnyis so //
T02D1243:172b-31: stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1243:172b-32: du nyams su myong ba dang grub pa'i mtha' dag
T02D1243:172b-33: pa ni phyi rol du thabs dang shes rab snyoms
T02D1243:172b-34: par 'jug pa nges par bstan pa'o //
T02D1243:172b-35: nyin mo dang mtshan mo rnam par dag pa ni thabs dag shes rab kyi dag pa'o //
T02D1243:172b-36: dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02D1243:172b-39: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag pa ni rigs par ro //
T02D1243:172b-40: sprul pa la sogs pa 'khor lo bzhi'i 'das ma
T02D1243:172b-41: la gnas pa ni de ltar dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D1243:172b-42: dam tshig gi rnal 'byor pas rdo rje dang gri
T02D1243:172b-43: gug 'dzin pas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
T02D1243:173a-0: don @173a * // du gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1243:173a-1: de la chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum du padma
T02D1243:173a-2: dmar po 'dab ma brgyad kyis brgyan pa dbus dang
T02D1243:173a-4: de la dbus kyi padma 'dab ma brgyad la shar
T02D1243:173a-5: gyi 'dab ma la dbang po mig stong pa phyag
T02D1243:173a-6: na rdo rje'o // glang po che dkar po'i gdan can no //
T02D1243:173a-7: lhor gshin rje phyag na dbyug pa'o //
T02D1243:173a-8: nag po ma he'i gdan can no //
T02D1243:173a-9: nub kyi 'dab ma la chu lha dkar po'o //
T02D1243:173a-10: chu srin gyi gdan can no //
T02D1243:173a-11: phyag na zhags pa can no //
T02D1243:173a-12: byang gi 'dab ma la gnod sbyin ser po byi la'i gdan can no //
T02D1243:173a-14: de rnams thams cad 'dzin pa'i rin po che'i cod pan can no //
T02D1243:173a-15: gshin rje nyi ma'i gdan can dang nyi ma'i 'od do //
T02D1243:173a-16: lhag ma zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od do //
T02D1243:173a-17: dbang ldan gyi 'dab ma la sa bdag spyan gsum pa /
T02D1243:173a-18: ral pa dang cod pan can no //
T02D1243:173a-19: khyu mchog gi gdan can lag na rtse gsum dkar po'o //
T02D1243:173a-20: stag gi pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa //
T02D1243:173a-21: thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa /
T02D1243:173a-22: rus pa'i rgyan can zla ba'i gdan dang de'i 'od do //
T02D1243:173a-23: me'i 'dab ma la me'i lha gsus pa 'phyang ba shin tu dmar ser ra la zhon pa /
T02D1243:173a-27: nyi ma'i gdan dang de'i 'od do //
T02D1243:173a-29: bden bral gyi 'dab ma la srin po skra dmar
T02D1243:173a-30: ser gyen du 'khyil ba gri gug dang thod pa
T02D1243:173a-31: 'dzin pa'o // smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa nag po //
T02D1243:173a-32: nyi ma'i 'od dang de'i gdan can no //
T02D1243:173a-33: rlung gi 'dab ma la rlung lha phyag na rgyal
T02D1243:173a-34: mtshan ljang gu dang rin po che'i cod pan can
T02D1243:173a-36: zla ba'i 'od dang de nyid kyi gdan can no //
T02D1243:173a-38: lte ba la sa'i lha ser po bzang po'i stan can /
T02D1243:173a-39: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1243:173a-41: zla ba'i stan la zla ba'i 'od do //
T02D1243:173a-42: yi dags kyis bskor nas gnas pa'o //
T02D1243:173a-43: steng gi chos 'byung la gnas pa'i 'dab ma brgyad la /
T02D1243:173a-44: shar gyi 'dab ma la zla ba dkar po'o //
T02D1243:173a-45: rta dkar po'i gdan can no //
T02D1243:173a-46: rin po che'i cod pan can lag na ku mu ta'o //
T02D1243:173a-47: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1243:173b-0: zla ba'i gdan dang zla @173b ba'i 'od do //
T02D1243:173b-1: lha'i 'dab ma la nyi ma dmar po phyag bzhi
T02D1243:173b-2: pa padma 'dzin pa rta ljang gu la zhon pa
T02D1243:173b-3: / rin po che'i cod pan can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1243:173b-5: nyi ma dang zla ba nya bar mtshon pa dang /
T02D1243:173b-6: phyogs dang phyogs ma yin pa'i mtshon pa mig dmar dang /
T02D1243:173b-18: mtshan ma dang rgyan can no //
T02D1243:173b-19: dbus kyi lte ba la tshangs pa zhal bzhi pa /
T02D1243:173b-22: mi 'jigs pa'i phyag na bgrang phreng dang /
T02D1243:173b-24: ser po ngang pa la zhon pa /
T02D1243:173b-25: zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od do //
T02D1243:173b-33: 'og min la sogs pa rang rang gi gzugs brtan par bya'o //
T02D1243:173b-34: 'og tu chos 'byung la gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma
T02D1243:173b-35: brgyad po rnams la phyogs mtshams su rim pa ltar
T02D1243:173b-36: stobs kyi rgyu ljang gu dang /
T02D1243:173b-39: nor rgyas kyi bu dmar po dang /
T02D1243:173b-41: rigs ldan ser ba dag dang /
T02D1243:173b-43: padma chen po dkar po dag ste /
T02D1243:173b-44: brgyad po de dag ni rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1243:173b-45: mi'i gdong pa la rgyan thams cad dang /
T02D1243:173b-48: sems can dmyal ba dang lhan cig pa'o//
T02D1243:173b-49: lte ba la lha dkar po mi'i thod pa can mi'i gdengs ka can te /
T02D1243:173b-50: de dag thams cad ni padma gsum la ste /
T02D1243:173b-51: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i dkar
T02D1243:173b-52: mos bkug nas chos rkun mas padma'i steng du bcug
T02D1243:173b-53: la / ro langs mas lcags sgrog gis bcings te /
T02D1243:173b-54: za phod mas dril bus dbang du byas la dbus
T02D1243:173b-55: kyi padma la gnas pa rnams ni rang rang gi
T02D1243:173b-56: mdog dang / rtags dang mtshan ma dang /
T02D1243:173b-57: dbyibs yongs su gyur nas sa bon gyi yi ge
T02D1243:173b-58: las skyes pa'i nag po mi bskyod pa'i cod pan
T02D1243:173b-59: can no // steng du gnas pa rnams ni rang rang gi gzugs dang /
T02D1243:174a-0: @174a * // gzugs kyi ngo bor gyur te /
T02D1243:174a-1: yi ge aom las skyes pa dkar po /
T02D1243:174a-2: rnam par snang mdzad cod pan can no //
T02D1243:174a-3: 'og na gnas pa rnams ni rang rang gi gzugs
T02D1243:174a-4: spangs te yi ge aa las skyes pa dmar po
T02D1243:174a-5: snang ba mtha' yas kyi cod pan can no //
T02D1243:174a-6: padma gsum la gnas pa de dag ni lag na rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02D1243:174a-7: gdong gcig pa rang snang ba'i rig ma'i yan lag
T02D1243:174a-8: gis 'khyud pa g-yas brgyang [*brkyang?] bas stan la gnas
T02D1243:174a-9: par blta'o // 'di rnams bstan par bya ste /
T02D1243:174a-10: de rnams la aom pra par satk'a ra aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1243:174a-11: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dung phor gyi nang du phyag rgyas mdun du mchod yin byin nas /
T02D1243:174a-12: snga ma bzhin du bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho gas
T02D1243:174a-13: gtor ma nye bar spyod pa bdud rtsi nyid du
T02D1243:174a-14: bsgrubs la / aom ainda dza ma dza la dzakkha /
T02D1243:174a-15: bh'u ta bahni b'a au rakkha /
T02D1243:174a-16: tsanda sudzdza m'a da babba t'a la b'a t'a le aatta sappa sv'a h'a /
T02D1243:174a-17: zhes bya ba 'dis de rnams bstod cing dril bu dkrol lo //
T02D1243:174a-18: gtor ma nye bar spyod pa de ni yi ge
T02D1243:174a-19: h'um las skyes pa'i nas 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje'i
T02D1243:174a-20: lce'i 'od zer gyi sbu gus drangs la rnal 'byor
T02D1243:174a-21: pa bdag bza' zhing de dag la yang bza' ba
T02D1243:174a-22: sbyin no // de dag kyang h'um las 'od zer
T02D1243:174a-23: gyi lce'i sbu gus drangs te de nas ji lta
T02D1243:174a-24: bar bde ba myang bar bsam par bya ste /
T02D1243:174a-25: ai dam ba lim bhunydza dzim gha phulla dh'u ppa m'am sa pim gha /
T02D1243:174a-26: aambha sappa kadzdza s'a d'a khanti khu ni phe da
T02D1243:174a-27: g'a da zhes bya ba la sgo bzhir dril bu
T02D1243:174a-29: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nutpanna tv'ata aom a'a:h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1243:174a-30: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis tshim par bya'o //
T02D1243:174a-31: kolla ai ri tthi aa bo l'a /
T02D1243:174a-33: gha ne kri bi ta ho badzdza ai ka ru ne ki aa aa na ro l'a /
T02D1243:174a-34: ta hi bam la kh'adzdza ai g'a dhem ma ae n'a pidzdza ai /
T02D1243:174a-35: ha le k'a li dzdza p'a ni aa ai dundu ra b'idzdzi aa ai /
T02D1243:174a-36: tsa au sa ma ka tstshu r'i sihl'a ka pu ra l'a ai aa ai /
T02D1243:174a-37: m'a la aindha na s'a lim dza ;
T02D1243:174a-38: ta him bha ru kh'a ai aa ai /
T02D1243:174a-39: phrem kha na kha ta ka ranti shuddha /
T02D1243:174a-40: aa shuddha na mu ni aa ai /
T02D1243:174a-41: ni ram shu aam ge tsa d'a wi /
T02D1243:174a-42: ta him dza sa r'a ba p'a ni aa ai /
T02D1243:174a-43: ma la aa dze kundu ru ba t'a ai /
T02D1243:174a-44: dindi mi ta him n'a b'adzdzi aa ai zhes bya
T02D1243:174a-45: ba rdo rje'i glu yan lag thams cad yongs su
T02D1243:174b-0: rdzogs shing yongs su rdzogs @174b par bya ste /
T02D1243:174b-2: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
T02D1243:174b-4: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D1243:174b-5: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1243:174b-6: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1243:174b-8: sarba karm'a su tsa me tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho /
T02D1243:174b-11: badzra m'a me munytsa badzri ba ba /
T02D1243:174b-12: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva a'a:zhes brjod la aom mu:zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1243:174b-13: de'i rjes la bza' bar bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1243:174b-14: gzhan yang za ba cho ga 'dis bza' bar bya
T02D1243:174b-15: ste / lto ba'i thab khung gi steng du snying
T02D1243:174b-16: ga'i nyi ma'i me la bza' bar bya ba la
T02D1243:174b-17: sogs pa'i rdzas zhu zhing lag pa'i blugs gzar gyis
T02D1243:174b-18: sbyin sreg bya zhing h'u% dkar po las byung ba'i
T02D1243:174b-19: rdo rje nas 'bras tsam gyis mtshan pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D1243:174b-20: lces sku gsum gyi bdag nyid 'khor lo dang bcas
T02D1243:174b-21: pa'i he ru ka'i gzugs can rnal 'byor pas dgang
T02D1243:174b-22: ste / blugs dbul lo // mgrin pa'i sgo nas
T02D1243:174b-23: de dag thams cad zhugs shing lto ba'i mes smin
T02D1243:174b-25: bdud rtsi des 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das legs par tshim par 'gyur ro //
T02D1243:174b-26: nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02D1243:174b-27: rgyal ba rnams kyis dag pas dag pa yongs rdzogs 'di dag rtag tu snang gang la /
T02D1243:174b-28: gzod nas skye 'gag med par gzhan dag rnam par bgrang ba'i rtog pa bye ba spangs /
T02D1243:174b-29: bden brdzun spangs shing gsal ba srid dang zhi ba mnyam zhing gnyis med tshul nges pa //
T02D1243:174b-30: de yi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid rgyal po'i yon tan gzhi yin rdo rje mkha' 'gro thub dbang po //
T02D1243:174b-31: dpal ldan khrag 'thung sgrub thabs shin tu rgyas pa dpal ldan rin chen lha mo'i phyir byas pa //
T02D1243:174b-32: yan lag rim pas byas 'dis rnam par dag pa'i gter zhes bshad par khas blangs nas //
T02D1243:174b-33: bdag gis byas pas bsod nams nyer bsags nges pa des ni sdug bsngal rnam bsal nas //
T02D1243:174b-34: 'jig rten gsum gyur skye bo myur du phyag rgya
T02D1243:174b-35: chen po'i gnas su 'gro bar shog / bdag gis
T02D1243:174b-37: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob pas //
T02D1243:174b-38: khams gsum sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1243:175a-1: gshegs sku gsum thob par shog / dpal kye rdo rje'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyal po /
